title: New: Twin Caverns – Gold Digger (Kanye West Rework)
body:
**Twin Caverns** just have such a gorgeous, textured sound.

They could pretty much cover anything and it would sound good. In this case, they’ve reworked Kanye’s 2005 (ten years old…shit) single _Gold Digger_, to illustrious effect. Check it out below.

excerpt.full: Twin Caverns just have such a gorgeous, textured sound. They could pretty much cover anything and it would sound good. In this case, they’ve reworked Kanye’s 2005 (ten years old…shit) single Gold Digger, to illustrious effect. Check it out below.
excerpt.short: Twin Caverns just have such a gorgeous, textured sound.
